mapper.sql: videoid, orgid, branchid, folderid, name, oname, uuid, type, width, height, format, filepath, filename, size, md5, previewflag, status, progress, description, thumbnail, relateid, tags, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select videoid, orgid, branchid, folderid, name, oname, uuid, type, width, height, format, filepath, filename, size, md5, previewflag, status, progress, description, thumbnail, 0 as relateid, tags, createtime, createstaffid from video where videoid = #{videoid} and status != '9'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
